795950.name: Deathly Storm: The Edge of Life
795950.description:
Deathly Storm: The Edge of Life

Story:

You are in the most livable area of the city after the explosion of nuclear and chemical warheads. You have spent too much time in this quarantine zone. Everything has begun to seem meaningless since you lost the track of time. Whereas, you still remember the dull life you had in front of your computer like it was yesterday. Your wife and children were the happiness you had. Now everything has changed...

Every day you try to get out of town by breaking the quarantine so you can learn the condition of your loved ones. Every day is a new hope... You kept pace with change but time is running out. The sun you do not see from the pollution, tries to illuminate the streets filled with zombies. The city does not want you... Are you eager enough to live and see your loved ones again?

Gameplay and Key Features:

  • Post-apocalyptic atmosphere
  • Story consists of 6 chapters
  • Standard fps mechanics
  • 17 different weapons to choose
  • Run away or kill zombies
  • Find the key to escape the city
  • Action - thriller
  • Based on a novel
  • Option to play the story with pixel-based graphics for retro lovers
  • Option to play Early Access TPS mode

Developer's Note:

The other stages of our project, which we continue to develop as an indie team, will be with you in the forthcoming years as books, series, movies, and animation.

Moreover, we are working on VR, iOS, and Android support as well as multiplayer adaptation of games.
795950.supported_languages:
英语*, 土耳其语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
